GitHub project page

GitHub project page


In them I trust; for they are [hackers]
Witty, courteous, liberal, full of spirit.

—3 Henry VI, I, ii, approximately

Currently most of the activities run on the project page.

The project has various sections:

  • Pull Requests: Submit proposed changes;

  • Issues: Report any problems encountered;

  • Discussions: For all other topics.

New developments between releases tend not to be announced on the main website. The website is updated only intermittently, when we post a new release or FreeTDS is somehow in the news, say.
